Plot the difference from two rast (SpatRaster) object

Source: R/plot_diff.R
plot_diff.Rd

Custon difference plots (x - y) of plot for SpatRaster (terra R-package) object based on terra package

Usage

plot_diff(
  x,
  y,
  col,
  absolute = T,
  relative = T,
  lim_1 = NA,
  lim_2 = NA,
  units = c("", expression("%")),
  ...
)

Arguments

x

SpatVector points

y

values to plot

col

color

absolute

to plot absolute difference

relative

to plot relative difference

lim_1

range of values for scale

lim_2

calculate symmetrical scale

units

units annotation

...

arguments to be passing to plot_raster

Examples


folder <- system.file("extdata",package="eva3dm")
wrf    <- paste0(folder,"/wrfinput_d01")
A      <- wrf_rast(wrf,'XLAT')
B      <- wrf_rast(wrf,'XLONG')
plot_diff(A,B,int = 2)
